help.title: How to Use
help.subtitle: Learn how to get the most out of TTC Alerts.
help.quickStartDesc: Get up and running in 4 simple steps.
help.step1Desc: View real-time service alerts on the home page.
help.step2Desc: Go to Settings and add your regular routes.
help.step3Desc: Use filter chips to show only what matters.
help.step4Desc: Add to home screen for quick access.
help.featuresGuideDesc: Explore all the features TTC Alerts has to offer.
help.gettingStartedContent1: TTC Alerts provides real-time service alerts for all TTC routes including subway, streetcar, and bus services.
help.gettingStartedContent2: The home page shows the current status of subway lines and any active service alerts. Alerts are automatically updated every few minutes.
help.gettingStartedContent3: You can browse all routes, save your favorites, and filter alerts to see only what's relevant to your commute.
help.understandingAlertsContent1: Alerts are categorized by type to help you quickly understand the impact:
help.alertTypeDelayDesc: Service is running but with delays
help.alertTypeDetourDesc: Routes are diverted from their normal path
help.filteringContent1: Use the filter chips at the top of the alerts page to show only specific types of alerts.
help.filteringContent2: The search bar lets you find specific routes or keywords in alert descriptions.
help.filteringContent3: Your filter selections are remembered so you'll see the same view next time.
help.savingContent1: Save your regular routes in Settings to quickly see alerts that affect your commute.
help.savingContent2: The 'My Alerts' tab shows only alerts for your saved routes.
help.savingContent3: You can save up to 20 routes and 20 stops.
help.installContent1: TTC Alerts works great as a standalone app on your device.
help.installIOS: Tap the Share button, then 'Add to Home Screen'
help.installAndroid: Tap the menu, then 'Install app' or 'Add to Home screen'
help.installDesktop: Look for the install icon in your browser's address bar
help.accountContent1: Creating an account lets you sync your preferences across devices.
help.accountContent2: We use biometric authentication (fingerprint, Face ID) for secure, passwordless login.
help.accountContent3: Recovery codes are provided during signup - keep these safe to recover your account.
help.troubleshootingDesc: Common issues and how to fix them.
help.faq1Tip2: Pull down to refresh the page
help.faq1Tip3: Try closing and reopening the app
help.faq2Tip1: Use Safari on iOS or Chrome on Android
help.faq2Tip2: Make sure you're on the website, not in an in-app browser
help.faq3Tip1: Make sure your device has biometrics set up
help.faq3Tip2: Try using your recovery codes instead
help.faq3Tip3: Clear site data and register again
help.faq4Answer1: Alert data is refreshed automatically, but you can:
help.faq4Tip2: Check the 'last updated' time in the header
help.needMoreHelpDesc: Still have questions? Here are some additional resources.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Learn more about TTC Alerts and its data sources.
about.developerBio: TTC Alerts is a passion project built by a Toronto transit rider who wanted a better way to stay informed about service disruptions. The app is free to use and continuously improved based on user feedback.
about.dataSourcesDesc: TTC Alerts uses open data and public APIs.
about.sourceTTCDesc: Real-time service alerts from the Toronto Transit Commission.
about.sourceGTFSDesc: Route and schedule information from Toronto Open Data.
about.sourceRealtimeDesc: Live arrival predictions from the NextBus API.
about.disclaimerText: TTC Alerts is an unofficial app and is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or connected to the Toronto Transit Commission (TTC). While we strive to provide accurate information, data may be delayed or incorrect.
about.disclaimerImportant: Always verify critical travel information on the official TTC website or contact TTC directly.
about.openSourceDesc: Built with modern open source technologies.
about.licenseInfo: TTC Alerts is built with open source software. See the project repository for full license information.
